entry.title: MarkDown的基本使用
entry.content: 前几天搭建好了个人网站，买了域名，折腾了好几个晚上，终于往事俱备，只欠东风了。估摸着第一篇写些啥，作为一名程序员来说， Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
